title: Esența vieții
description:
‘The Essence of Life’ captures the delicate tension between creation and decay in a single suspended form.
A large, organic droplet hangs luminous against a backdrop of vivid cerulean and pale neutrals, as if caught in the moment of becoming or dissolving.

Rich textures of layered oil paint create shimmering transitions—from translucent blues and aquamarines
to warm golden veins—suggesting both the fragility and resilience of life itself.
Dark rivulets drip from the base, grounding the ethereal form in a visceral reminder of impermanence.

This evocative composition invites contemplation of transformation, renewal, and the beauty found in imperfection.
